entry.title: $2599 // AMAZING 2.5 BED 2 BATH WITH DUPLEX BASEMENT PRIVATE YARD SPIRAL STAIRS
entry.content:
*CRAZY LOW PRICE FOR FEBRUARY FIRST MOVE IN*
LOOK AT THIS EXTREMELY UNIQUE THREE BEDROOM DUPLEX THAT ALSO HAS TWO BATHROOMS! THIS UNIT HAS GORGEOUS DESIGNS AND IS A STEAL FOR THE PRICE!!! DON'T SLEEP ON THIS OFFER!! COME VIEW IT WITH A BROOKLIV AGENT ON A PRIVATE TOUR AT YOUR EARLIEST CONVENIENCE!!!
GORGEOUS MODERN BRAND NEW THREE BEDROOM DUPLEX APARTMENT WITH TWO BATHROOMS AND A *PRIVATE BACK YARD* IN A STUNNING BUILDING IN THE HOTTEST AREA OF CLINTON HILL!!!!


Amenities:

*PRIVATE BACK YARD; PERFECT TO RELAX AFTER A LONG DAY*

Spacious Kitchen/Living room with tonzzz of sunlight
Fully tiled bathroom with a TUB
Second FULL Bathroom with a Shower
THREE Spacious bedrooms
Tons of natural sun light throughout the apartment
Kitchen with STAINLESS STEEL appliances
Hardwood floors throughout the apartment!
Storage Space Available

Right near nice restaurants, shops, grocery stores, bars and much more!

Right by the A,C and G trains; a ride to Manhattan in minutes!


***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***


Call or email today for a PRIVATE showing before it's GONE!!!!
